tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ***** **** ** *** ***** **** She was very patient in explaining the issues of my teeth and all possible procudures for it, she was equally polite as well. I had to remove two of my wisdom teeth and she did both the procedures as cool as a cucumber. She was available online as well to assist me pre and post my surgery. She made the whole process very comfortable and relieving. Kids would want to be around such a dentist. I am grateful for her, a true professional!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an excellent experience here, I decided to go to this place after reading the reviews, the doctor was very friendly she was kind enough to listen to all my problems and explained to me what was the problem, suggested the treatment and was very professional. I went to the doctor for my wisdom tooth extraction and was very scared doctor made me feel very comfortable and it was painless. She was also following up every day after the treatment to check on my condition, she also made sure that all safety precautions were taken care of during this pandemic season, and it is very affordable also. I highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a dentist appointment üëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Soundaram is amazing. 
She is super friendly and is such an experienced doctor. 
I am a person who has been very sceptical of dentists in the past, having had a bad experience previously, but Dr. Soundaram completely shattered my fears and hesitations. 
Gave me the best results along with such a wonderful experience. 
10/10.

review: Earlier i had been to a different clinic, where my wisdom tooth was not extracted properly and maximum damage was created in that entire area. When i visited Dr.Soundaram, she assessed my condition well and extracted the wisdom tooth smoothly while taking care of the problems I already had in that area. Doctor made me feel very comfortable and there was a good follow-up. Highly professional and would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited Dent4u recently for my son. My son was very much tensed as it is his first visit to dentist, but surprisingly he was very much comfortable after meeting Dr.SOUNDARAM. She is very friendly, understanding, polite n great. I strongly recommend this place for any dental issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Took my mother for a dental procedure. My mom being a senior citizen,  the doc patiently listened to all her complaints and then treated her with care. My mother also felt very comfortable. ******* ********* *********** ********** ** ********** She was very cordial and the clinic is also well maintained. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ******** ** ***** I have come across very few doctors who are quite honest and authentic. I am glad that I went to Dr.Soundaram for my treatment. She tell you exactly what you need and sometimes even if you insist for a surgery and she feels it's unnecessary, she'll make sure you don't do it. Clearly money is not the motive. Great follow up, very compassionate and friendly. Highly highly recommend anyone looking for a dentist. Please go to her !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Soundaram is one of the most understanding, soft spoken, polite and sincere doctors that i have ever met..she understood my fear of surgery pain and did all that she could to ease my physical pain as well as emotional fear...her follow up and care was amazing....she is * ***** *********** ** * ******* ******* *** a wonderful human being...
